title: Where to buy Rune Pages?
body: Where do you buy em? I've looked through all the tabs of the store and i could'nt find any.

replies.body:
Under the *Gameplay* tab, ensure your sorting parameters for *Tier* is set to *Show All*, as shown in the screenshot below.

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

Let me know if this helped. ^.^
